Hi, I'm Derrick. I am a:

* PhD student at the [Colorado School of Mines](https://www.mines.edu/)' [Center for Wave Phenomena](https://cwp.mines.edu/)

* Research Engineer for the [National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health](https://www.cdc.gov/niosh/index.htm)

* [Open-source Developer](https://github.com/d-chambers) 

My professional interests include *mine geophysics*, *distributed acoustic sensing*, and *scientific software development*.
